summary: This code is executing two shell scripts (indicator_x86_64.sh and batcher_x86_64.sh) concurrently on an x86_64 architecture system using Bash shell. The ampersand (&) symbol allows the second command to run in the background while the first one continues execution. This could be part of a setup process where these scripts perform different tasks in parallel.

details.comment: This code is executing two shell scripts (indicator_x86_64.sh and batcher_x86_64.sh) concurrently on an x86_64 architecture system using Bash shell. This could be part of a setup process where these scripts perform different tasks in parallel.
